Interface FacePamphletConstants

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    FacePamphlet, FacePamphletCanvas, FacePamphletDatabase, FacePamphletProfile

    public interface FacePamphletConstants

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int APPLICATION_HEIGHT
      The height of the application window
      static int APPLICATION_WIDTH
      The width of the application window
      static double BOTTOM_MESSAGE_MARGIN
      The number of pixels in the vertical margin between the bottom of the canvas display area and the baseline for the message text that appears near the bottom of the display
      static java.lang.String EMPTY_LABEL_TEXT
      Text to be used to create an "empty" label to put space between interactors on EAST border of application.
      static double IMAGE_HEIGHT
      The height (in pixels) that profile images should be displayed
      static double IMAGE_MARGIN
      The number of pixels in the vertical margin between the baseline of the Name component and the top of the Image displayed in the profile
      static double IMAGE_WIDTH
      The width (in pixels) that profile images should be displayed
      static double LEFT_MARGIN
      The number of pixels in the hortizontal margin between the left side of the canvas display area and the Name, Image, and Status components that are display in the profile
      static java.lang.String MESSAGE_FONT
      Name of font used to display the application message at the bottom of the display canvas
      static java.lang.String PROFILE_FRIEND_FONT
      Name of font used to display the names from the user's list of friends in a profile
      static java.lang.String PROFILE_FRIEND_LABEL_FONT
      Name of font used to display the label "Friends" above the user's list of friends in a profile
      static java.lang.String PROFILE_IMAGE_FONT
      Name of font used to display the text "No Image" in user profiles that do not contain an actual image
      static java.lang.String PROFILE_NAME_FONT
      Name of font used to display the name in a user's profile
      static java.lang.String PROFILE_STATUS_FONT
      Name of font used to display the status in a user's profile
      static double STATUS_MARGIN
      The number of vertical pixels in the vertical margin between the bottom of the Image and the top of the Status component in the profile
      static int TEXT_FIELD_SIZE
      Number of characters for each of the text input fields
      static double TOP_MARGIN
      The number of pixels in the vertical margin between the top of the canvas display area and the top (NOT the baseline) of the Name component that is displayed in the profile
